message.body: I booked you for sep 23 and oct 21 and nothing else so far. Right?
Should I add a November date or wait to see what happens with your art gallery or with going abroad?
Ah! Well, I will definitely be going abroad but I haven't bought my ticket yet, so book away!
So are you going after the holidays at this point? To school on switzerland?
Hahaha no I haven't totally given up on my life Yet
They haven't hired for the fabric workshop job that I applied to so I still might get it
It's full time so I won't have to juggle 3 pt jobs to be able to work in 1pt gallery job that's actually in my field anymore
I would consider school in switzerland to be the opposite of giving up on life
But I hope you get the job here in Philly!
